house_listing.house_description: This home has it all, new gas heat & air system, new paint inside & out, new siding-roof, new wall to wall carpetng. Some work still in progress, buyers pick your own colors while you can. Lock box on door next to carport. Please leave card.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Fenced,Ranch Style
